headline: Riyadh, Saudi Arabia: Cloudflare Data Center #126
keywords: March of Cloudflare, Data Center, Cloudflare Network, Middle East
description: We are very excited to announce Cloudflare’s 126th data center in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia (only hours after launching in Reykjavík!). This joins our existing Middle East facilities to provide even stronger coverage and resilience for over 7 million Internet users.
